snippet: More than a few sellers were angered by an eBay policy that holds onto some payments for 21 days. That prompted the Haggler to investigate.
abstract: David Segal The Haggler column investigates an eBay policy that holds onto some payments for 21 days, which angers some sellers; notes iBay is tinkering with its filter so sellers with impeccable records will be not flagged in the future.
lead_paragraph: More than a few sellers were angered by an eBay policy that holds onto some payments for 21 days. That prompted the Haggler to investigate.
